attributes.action: Abolish the TV licence - It's failing and I need the money
attributes.additional_details: It's old and has no relevance, it shows nothing but repeats. It's innovation is long gone and the management is horrendous. Abolish the TV licence and make the BBC a private company who can go find their own funding. British homes need the money more than ever and I know I would rather have it than the BBC waste it!
